comments.author: vigneshrajas
comments.content: Semma!china la Germany la tamil kathuranga..china la tamil book release panirukanga oru lady...but tamilnaatla yarum olunga tamil padikka maatranga...!!

comments.author: Indumathi
comments.content: rhomba correct ! Ipolam tamil la pesunave asignama iruku nu nenaikuranga..Mall la suthum podhu varatha phone eh eduthu "Can you hear me?" nu keta naalu peru paarpanga. Lift la eragum podhu "Can you just give a way for us?" apdi sonna udane pakathula irukuravanga solranga,"Paah! husband and wife rendu perum nala padichavanga pola nu". hehe
